chart.title: Leading cancer types causing death in women
chart.subtitle: The most common cause of [cancer](#dod:cancer) deaths in women, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
chart.note: Only shown for countries with sufficient levels of [death registration](#dod:crvs).

Leading cancer types causing death in fe.titleShort: The most common cancer type as a cause of death in women
Leading cancer types causing death in fe.titleLong: The most common cancer type as a cause of death in women
Leading cancer types causing death in fe.descriptionShort: The most common cause of [cancer](#dod:cancer) deaths in females, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
Leading cancer types causing death in fe.descriptionProcessing: The most common cancer type as a cause of death was identified using the total number of deaths from every type of cancer.
Leading cancer types causing death in fe.citationShort: WHO Mortality Database (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
Leading cancer types causing death in fe.citationLong: WHO Mortality Database (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “The most common cancer type as a cause of death in women” [dataset]. WHO Mortality Database, “WHO Mortality Database” [original data].
